description:
Cheerful and good humoured, Kouran is mechanically inclined and loves to work with the Koubu.
Despite her cheerful attitude, she also has a serious side regarding her past:
a bandit raid killed her parents and she is said to be the only survivor of her village.
A running joke in the series is that Kouran`s inventions are rather accident-prone, often backfiring or blowing up in her face.
She idolizes the creator of the Koubu, Shinnosuke Yamazaki.
name: Li Kouran
